attributes.action: Remove subsidies from companies harming environment & subsidise solar instead.
attributes.additional_details:
This will help energy security to UK
Provide jobs to locals
Help UK to meet climate goals. 
Remove future needs to provide subsidies to Fossil fuels companies.
attributes.background:
1. Stop giving subsidies to fossil fuel companies and companies harming environment like Drax energy. 
2. Provide every home in UK with solar power and air heat pump at 0% interest.

rejection.details:
We understand you are concerned about Government support for certain companies. We already have a number of petitions relating to Government subsidies for fossil fuel companies and support for green home improvements open, which you may wish to sign:

'End All Government Subsidies for Fossil Fuel Companies'
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621583

Fund grants for installation of solar panels and battery storage for households: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613855

Increase subsidies and grants for homeowners to improve their energy ratings: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619507
